local_intent: Perceive the T-block, set yaw to 90 deg, then approach and align to the block with 0.005 tolerance (retry up to 2), settle briefly, and verify orientation.
assumptions: Yaw 90 deg is correct for side-contact approach
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase: visibility check with scan fallback, precise detect, set yaw for side contact, approach-and-align with retry, brief stabilization, and orientation verification; consistent with the global plan before the push.
